snippet: Ana Ivanovic raised her level of play late in the second set, then stayed on the attack to come from a set down to beat Sloane Stephens at Arthur Ashe Stadium on Saturday night to advance to the fourth round.
abstract: Ana Ivanovic raised her level of play late in the second set, then stayed on the attack to come from a set down to beat Sloane Stephens at Arthur Ashe Stadium on Saturday night to advance to the fourth round.

headline.main: For Stephens, Lessons in a Loss to Ivanovic
